description:
This content requires "Shadowverse: Champion's Battle" and cannot be used with the demo version.

A Premium Pass that comes with the points needed to reach level 10 in the indicated season. Purchasing this content will add premium rewards to each level of the Battle Pass. Leader skin Premium Pass rewards are also sold separately.

Leader skin rewards:
-Level 3: "Shadow Knight: Ein"
-Level 15: "Kagura: Heavenly Envoy"
-Level 30: "Luca: Dark Emperor"

Other rewards:
-Emblems
-Card Sleeves
-Rupies
-Umbra Coins
-Card Packs
-Leader Skins
-Flairs
-Mythical Cards (Random)

Notice
-Be careful not to purchase the same content twice. This Premium Pass contains the following items that are also sold separately: "Leader Skin: 'Luca: Dark Emperor'", "Leader Skin: 'Kagura: Heavenly Envoy'", "Leader Skin: 'Shadow Knight: Ein'".
name: Season 3 Premium Pass + 10 Levels
